Gaston Kaboré (a mụrụ n'afọ 1951) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri nke Burkinabé na onye dị mkpa na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke Burkina Faso. O ritere ihe nrite maka ihe nkiri ya bụ Wend Kuuni na Buud Yam
A mụrụ Kaboré n'afọ 1951 na Bobo-Dioulasso na Upper Volta

Ọ gụrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme na Sorbonne na Paris, France, na-enweta ikikere ya na Maîtrise (Master's) degrees. Mgbe ọ na-eme nchọpụta banyere akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ajọ mbunobi agbụrụ megide Africa site n'aka ndị na-achị ya maka Maîtrise ya, a dọtara Kaboré na ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere n'oge a nke, o chere, nọgidere na-agbasa ụdị echiche dị otú ahụ. Iji ghọtakwuo "asụsụ nke ihe nkiri", o kpebiri ịga ụlọ akwụkwọ ihe nkiri ESEC
Na mbụ, ọ na-ezube iji ihe nkiri mee ihe dị ka ihe na-agbasa ihe ọmụma akụkọ ihe mere eme, ọ ji nwayọọ nwayọọ nwee mmasị na ihe nkiri maka onwe ya
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta ya na Film Production n'afọ 1976. Ọ laghachiri n'obodo ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke Centre National du Cinéma

Ihe nkiri ya bụ Wend Kuuni bụ naanị ihe nkiri nke abụọ e mepụtara na Burkina Faso. Ọrụ ya maka ihuenyo, na-elekwasị anya na ihe nketa ime obodo nke mba ya, enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye mba ụwa, gụnyere onyinye César nke France.
N'afọ 1997, o ritere ihe nrite mbụ na 15th Panafrican Film and Television Festival of Ouagadougou (FESPACO) na ihe nkiri Buud Yam

Site n'afọ 1985 ruo afọ 1997 ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Pan African Federation of Filmmakers (FEPACI). Kemgbe afọ 2005, o nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ, Imagine, na Ouagadougou nke na-azụ ndị ọkachamara na ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn na ihe nkiri.
